body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Car Dealership Support. My name is Kevin Lopez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Kevin, my name is Sarah Barnes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. Before we proceed, could you please provide me with your phone number, spelled out digit by digit?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's nine two five, six seven eight, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Now, could you also share with me your home address, but this time, spell out each number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three Main Street, apartment three zero five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Sarah. Is there anything else you'd like to share or ask about our security measures at Car Dealership?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling excited about the new security features you've implemented.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Sarah. Your feedback is valuable to us. Thank you for sharing your thoughts. If you need any further assistance or have more questions, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time and have a great day.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Kevin. Have a great day too!
